item.title: Gold FOMO could push metal to $4,000
item.description: Gold's explosive growth this year is showing no signs of a slowdown. In fact, State Street sees a new milestone for the precious metal coming soon.

item.title: Why are mortgage rates increasing despite a rate cut from the Fed?

item.title: General Mills to close pizza, pet food manufacturing plants in Missouri
item.description: The Minnesota-based food giant announced closures of pizza crust and pet food factories in Missouri, expecting $82 million in restructuring charges.
